ModMetaData.name: LandingZone
ModMetaData.author: wcbryant
ModMetaData.description: LandingZone helps you find the perfect settlement location by filtering world tiles based on climate, terrain, resources, and geographic features. Key Features: • 12 Curated Presets - One-click configurations for different playstyles and in-game experiences. Modify those, and/or create and save your own. • Advanced Mode - 50+ filter criteria organized across 6 intuitive tabs (Climate & Weather, Terrain & Water, Resources & Production, Structures & Events, Biome Control, Results & Recovery) • Live Selectivity Feedback - Real-time tile count estimates and restrictiveness warnings as you configure filters • Intelligent Fallback Tiers - Progressive loosening when your ideal configuration has zero results • Bookmarks - Save and name interesting tile locations for later comparison and reference • Two-Phase Architecture - Efficient filtering and ranking of thousands of tiles in seconds The mod seamlessly integrates with RimWorld's world generation screen, adding a preferences button to the bottom ribbon. AI Usage Disclosure: This mod was created with quality control and organizational assistance from AI tools. The content has been reviewed and edited by a human. For more information on the extent and nature of AI usage, please contact the author.
